page.title: 09Education in Aireborough
page.content: Schools.Education in Aireborough is a two-tier system of primary and secondary schools,within Leeds City Education Authority.There are seven primary schools(2 Church controlled), for ages 5-11.They vary in size and age,but are all happy caring schools. Two large comprehensive schools offer a wide range of subjects.Both have a sixth form and a good public examination pass-rate.Space permitting parental choice is avaiable. Adult Education classes take place both during the day andin the evening. There is a Music Centre on Saturdays. Trinity and All Saints College,a Catholic foundation for Higher Education,offers University of Leeds degree courses in Arts,Science and Education.
